mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS book ( BOOK_NO INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, BOOK_NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, BOOK_GENRE VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, BOOK_PUBLISHER VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, BOOK_AUTHOR CHAR(30) NOT NULL, BOOK_DATE DATE NOT NULL, BOOK_ISBN VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(BOOK_NO, BOOK_ISBN) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (BOOK_NAME, BOOK_GENRE, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_DATE, BOOK_ISBN) VALUES(#{bookName}, #{bookGenre}, #{bookPublisher}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookDate}, #{bookIsbn})
